TextView.android:text: List of Chief of Air Force Staff

PMay 1, 1976 to September 1, 1976

December 9, 1977 to July 22, 1981

July 23, 1981 to July 22, 1987

July 23, 1987 to June 4, 1991

June 4, 1991 to June 3, 1995

June 4, 1995 to June 3, 2001
